data.title: The Leona Lewis Appreciation Thread (Part 63) - Page 41
data.meta_description: That Nostra account is reliable, as they seem to have quite some things right from Beyonce to Ariana.
data.text:
Seen a few tweets about an album coming this year, any substance to this?

It's what I have been saying since last year

She'll be on Sunday Brunch this weekend to.

An advert for Sunday Brunch says that "Leona Lewis talks about her new album".

I wonder if this is right or if they mean CWL? ü§î

Depends which one, the one I was talking about that should/could be released before the tour and was 50% done in Summer is not completely finished so most likely for another time.. I dont know anything about the other one

She'll be on Sunday Brunch this weekend to.

An advert for Sunday Brunch says that "Leona Lewis talks about her new album".

I wonder if this is right or if they mean CWL? ü§î

I don't think we're going to get another album from her. Realistically, if we were going to get one it would have been in the past eight years. She must know that success with an album after all this time is more or less out of reach.

She definitely has one coming out which is nearly finished but it should have been finished by now imo and I think that was the plan

Leona has a song for kids with Snoop Dogg, she did voice over as well

https://open.spotify.com/album/5JPKylcHNiXsaZ0sq0w92a?si=5MOT9no-T1G28CrHQUN7-A

Plot twist this is the new music she‚Äôs been working on for 8 years

Soe is too quite. So maybe it is. lol

I think the album she‚Äôs been recording recently and couple of years ago could probably be released before xmas but that‚Äôs just my theory.

Leona captioned her latest insta pic (selfie) with ‚Äúnext album cover?‚Äù

Is this Leona‚Äôs idea of a tease or is she blissfully unaware that people may read into that? (It‚Äôs me, I‚Äôm people)

Lets remember she isnt even signed to a label, she just thought this was a good caption üò≠üòõ

The album she was recording recently wasn‚Äôt necessarily needed to be signed to that label

This wasn‚Äôt a definitive date though, I‚Äôm just wondering if the Autumn-ish time frame is more confirmed now.

Im just saying he‚Äôs talking about an album which I have been mentioning long time ago but people just seemed to not believe it.

I don‚Äôt think I ever doubted your info (or if I do I don‚Äôt remember), I was just curious if the time frame is accurate, my question was basically aimed at you anyway as I‚Äôd never seen those other twitter accounts or know if they‚Äôre reliable.

That Nostra account is reliable, as they seem to have quite some things right from Beyonce to Ariana. They also mentioned last Summer that she was in the studio, which is when I said the album was 50% done.. I don‚Äôt know about release date but as I assumed they‚Äôd release before xmas tour then this would make sense. I also don‚Äôt know If they‚Äôre talking about the album Im talking about as she‚Äôs recording two, but the proper studio album is still in progress last time I heard..

Leonalewisinfo account is just tweeting what nostra said

She has been in studio this year everytime she wasn‚Äôt busy with the film, so probably finishing up. She was also working on something she could not reveal but Im not sure if it‚Äôs big since she‚Äôs being secret about it

I don‚Äôt think I ever doubted your info (or if I do I don‚Äôt remember), I was just curious if the time frame is accurate, my question was basically aimed at you anyway as I‚Äôd never seen those other twitter accounts or know if they‚Äôre reliable.

They also mentioned last Summer that she was in the studio, which is when I said the album was 50% done.. I don‚Äôt know about release date but as I assumed they‚Äôd release before xmas tour then this would make sense. She has been in studio this year everytime she wasn‚Äôt busy with the film, so probably finishing up. She was also working on something she could not reveal but Im not sure if it‚Äôs big since she‚Äôs being secret about it

Hi everyone. Hope everyone's doing ok during this news/music drought. I'm back after lurking for 4 years, ha.

Here's a snippet from a Jesse McCartney interview from a couple days ago where he talks about writing BL and briefly talks about the Tiesto/Karol G collab sampling the song. The interviewer shades Leona and calls her a one-hit-wonder, which is arguable in America (where the interview is) at least.

https://www.facebook.com/ZachSangShow/videos/jesse-mccartney-on-writing-bleeding-love-for-leona-lewis/332835949803241/

I know he ultimately says he‚Äôs grateful/wouldn‚Äôt change a thing, but I think it‚Äôs pretty dismissive of him to underplay Leona‚Äôs role in that song being huge. That ‚Äúone hit wonder‚Äù who no one knew is what keeps him fed as the interviewer points out. Maybe he gets asked about this all the time and so he is understandably fatigued by the question, but I‚Äôm not a fan of the ‚Äúthank you to everyone who made this song possible except the actual singer‚Äù.

Don‚Äôt get me wrong he was nice about Leona but it just rubs me the wrong way that he doesn‚Äôt seem totally convinced it was a hit because of her and not in spite of her. Yes she wasn‚Äôt a mega star but for anyone who was watching the UK pop scene at the time there was a huge appetite for a singer that had the voice and style she did, and she had millions of people interested to see what she would do next after X Factor. Simon also had big influence in the US/international market and voila you had all the ingredients for a mega hit.

BL is a good song but I‚Äôm not convinced that it would have been as big as it was if it was sung by someone even more famous than her at the time, though I appreciate it certainly wouldn‚Äôt feel that way to a US audience.
